input:
Marshall wants to finish typing his English paper before class starts. If he still has 550 words left to type and class starts in 25 minutes, at least how fast must Marshall type to finish his paper on time?

A) 27 words per minute
B) 20 words per minute
C) 22 words per minute
D) 26 words per minute
E) 30 words per minute
F) 25 words per minute
G) 23 words per minute
H) 28 words per minute
I) 24 words per minute
J) 21 words per minute

additional_args.task_instruction: Answer the provided question by choosing one option. Include the letter corresponding to your answer in the solution.
additional_args.input_str:
Marshall wants to finish typing his English paper before class starts. If he still has 550 words left to type and class starts in 25 minutes, at least how fast must Marshall type to finish his paper on time?

A) 27 words per minute
B) 20 words per minute
C) 22 words per minute
D) 26 words per minute
E) 30 words per minute
F) 25 words per minute
G) 23 words per minute
H) 28 words per minute
I) 24 words per minute
J) 21 words per minute
additional_args.persona_description: A student who is familiar with the format of standardized tests and has experience in quickly reading and comprehending multiple-choice questions under timed conditions.

So, Marshall must type at least 22 words per minute to finish his paper on time.

Marshall wants to finish typing his English paper before class starts. If he still has 550 words left to type and class starts in 25 minutes, at least how fast must Marshall type to finish his paper on time?

A) 27 words per minute
B) 20 words per minute
C) 22 words per minute
D) 26 words per minute
E) 30 words per minute
F) 25 words per minute
G) 23 words per minute
H) 28 words per minute
I) 24 words per minute
J) 21 words per minute

additional_args.task_instruction: Answer the provided question by choosing one option. Include the letter corresponding to your answer in the solution.
additional_args.input_str:
Marshall wants to finish typing his English paper before class starts. If he still has 550 words left to type and class starts in 25 minutes, at least how fast must Marshall type to finish his paper on time?

A) 27 words per minute
B) 20 words per minute
C) 22 words per minute
D) 26 words per minute
E) 30 words per minute
F) 25 words per minute
G) 23 words per minute
H) 28 words per minute
I) 24 words per minute
J) 21 words per minute
additional_args.persona_description: A student who is familiar with the format of standardized tests and has experience in quickly reading and comprehending multiple-choice questions under timed conditions.

So, Marshall must type at least 22 words per minute to finish his paper on time.

additional_args.input_str:
Marshall wants to finish typing his English paper before class starts. If he still has 550 words left to type and class starts in 25 minutes, at least how fast must Marshall type to finish his paper on time?

A) 27 words per minute
B) 20 words per minute
C) 22 words per minute
D) 26 words per minute
E) 30 words per minute
F) 25 words per minute
G) 23 words per minute
H) 28 words per minute
I) 24 words per minute
J) 21 words per minute

additional_args.task_instruction: Answer the provided question by choosing one option. Include the letter corresponding to your answer in the solution.
additional_args.input_str:
Marshall wants to finish typing his English paper before class starts. If he still has 550 words left to type and class starts in 25 minutes, at least how fast must Marshall type to finish his paper on time?

A) 27 words per minute
B) 20 words per minute
C) 22 words per minute
D) 26 words per minute
E) 30 words per minute
F) 25 words per minute
G) 23 words per minute
H) 28 words per minute
I) 24 words per minute
J) 21 words per minute
additional_args.persona_description: A student who is familiar with the format of standardized tests and has experience in quickly reading and comprehending multiple-choice questions under timed conditions.

So, Marshall must type at least 22 words per minute to finish his paper on time.

additional_args.input_str:
Marshall wants to finish typing his English paper before class starts. If he still has 550 words left to type and class starts in 25 minutes, at least how fast must Marshall type to finish his paper on time?

A) 27 words per minute
B) 20 words per minute
C) 22 words per minute
D) 26 words per minute
E) 30 words per minute
F) 25 words per minute
G) 23 words per minute
H) 28 words per minute
I) 24 words per minute
J) 21 words per minute

So, Marshall must type at least 22 words per minute to finish his paper on time.

additional_args.input_str:
Marshall wants to finish typing his English paper before class starts. If he still has 550 words left to type and class starts in 25 minutes, at least how fast must Marshall type to finish his paper on time?

A) 27 words per minute
B) 20 words per minute
C) 22 words per minute
D) 26 words per minute
E) 30 words per minute
F) 25 words per minute
G) 23 words per minute
H) 28 words per minute
I) 24 words per minute
J) 21 words per minute

additional_args.input_str:
Marshall wants to finish typing his English paper before class starts. If he still has 550 words left to type and class starts in 25 minutes, at least how fast must Marshall type to finish his paper on time?

A) 27 words per minute
B) 20 words per minute
C) 22 words per minute
D) 26 words per minute
E) 30 words per minute
F) 25 words per minute
G) 23 words per minute
H) 28 words per minute
I) 24 words per minute
J) 21 words per minute

550 words / 25 minutes = 22 words per minute.

So, Marshall must type at least 22 words per minute to finish his paper on time.

To determine the minimum typing speed required for Marshall to finish his paper on time, we divide the total number of words left by the total number of minutes he has left:

Total words left: 550
Time left: 25 minutes

550 words / 25 minutes = 22 words per minute

The minimum typing speed required for Marshall to finish his paper on time is indeed 22 words per minute. This means that if he maintains a consistent typing speed of 22 words per minute, he will complete his paper right on time.

However, to account for any potential delays, interruptions, or needs to make edits, it is recommended that Marshall aims to type at a slightly faster rate to ensure he finishes his paper before class starts. By typing slightly faster than 22 words per minute, he can build a buffer to accommodate any unexpected delays or interruptions, ultimately ensuring that he completes his paper on time.

In summary, Marshall must type at least 22 words per minute to finish his paper on time, but it is recommended that he aim for a slightly faster rate to account for any potential delays or interruptions.
